articles.description: The OnePlus 9 Pro's new screen ramps itself down to 1Hz to save power, the company says.
articles.content:
OnePlus is known for speed, but the OnePlus 9 Pro's new screen aims to be known for how much it slows down. 
OnePlus and DisplayMate Labs gave us an exclusive peek at some of the specs for the new O… [+7216 chars]
